files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.ActionContextInstance
files.Summary: An implementation of the 'old' thread safe singleton ActionContext we all know and love from .NET Framework

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Attributes.ApiTokenFilterAttribute
files.Summary:
Filters access based on api-token header

Optional: set a custom token header name

Input:

`null`: Allows all

`*`: Allows all

- A regex: Value must satisfy the regex pattern

- A pipe separated list: Any part is within the Value in a case insensitive check

`text`: Value must match, case sensitive

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Attributes.OriginFilterAttribute
files.Summary:
Filters access based on Origin header

Input:

`null`: Allows all

`*`: Allows all

- A regex: Value must satisfy the regex pattern

- A pipe separated list: Any part is within the Value in a case insensitive check

`text`: Value must match, case sensitive 
[OriginFilter(null)] // Allows all
[OriginFilter("*")] // Allows all
[OriginFilter("^[ab0-4]{4,}$")] // Allow origin containing `a, b, 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4` with a minimum length of 4
[OriginFilter("SystemLibrary\.com")] // Exact match of SystemLibrary.com, case sensitive
[OriginFilter("test.systemlibrary\.com|test2.systemlibrary.com")] // Allow origins containing test.systemlibrary.com or test2.systemlibrary.com, case insensitive

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Attributes.UserAgentFilterAttribute
files.Summary:
Filters access based on User-Agent header

NOTE: If attribute is added it blocks most known spiders, crawlers and bots even if you allow all

Input:

`null`: Allows all

`*`: Allows all

- A regex: Value must satisfy the regex pattern

- A pipe separated list: Any part is within the Value in a case insensitive check

`text`: Value must match, case sensitive 
[UserAgentFilter(null)] // Allows all
[UserAgentFilter("*")] // Allows all
[UserAgentFilter("^[ab0-4]{4,}$")] // Allow user agents containing only `a, b, 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4` with a minimum length of 4
[UserAgentFilter("User Agent")] // Exact match of 'User Agent', case sensitive
[UserAgentFilter("firefox|edg|chrome")] // Allow user agents containing firefox or edg or chrome, case insensitive

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.BaseApiController
files.Summary:
Inherit BaseApiController to get an automatic documentation of all your api endpoints

All controllers inheriting BaseApiController are automatically picked up if matching the request path

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Cache
files.Summary:
Caching for applications

Default duration is 3 minutes

Try using auto-generating cache keys, which differentiate caching down to user roles.

- Cache things per user, by userId/email? Create your own cacheKey

'Ignore' means the function will always be invoked directly, bypassing the cache entirely.

Skip options:

- skipWhenAuthenticated, false by default

- skipWhenAdmin, true by default

The user must belong to one of the following case-sensitive roles: Admin, Admins, Administrator, Administrators, WebAdmins, CmsAdmins, admin, admins, administrator, administrators.

- skipWhen, your own condition, must return True to skip

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.CalleeCancelledRequestException
files.Summary:
The Callee Cancelled Request Exception is thrown when the callee (you) cancel's the request.

  • To cancel a request you must pass a 'Cancellation Token', and then cancel the request through the Cancellation Token

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Client
files.Summary:
Client is a class for all http(s) requests in your project

Uses HttpClient and Polly behind the scenes for features such as reusing tcp connections, retry on 502 and 504 status codes, and optionally a request breaker for 7 seconds, if 25 error codes (404, 429, 500, 502, 503, 504, 505) occurs in a row

useRetryPolicy: false, will retry once if request is a file request or GET or POST and status code is 502 or 504

Options:

useRetryPolicy:

True: same as 'false', but adds:

- retries one additional time on 502, 504 GET, POST

- retries up to two times if response is null (timeout/no response)

- retries once on 401 GET, POST

- retries once on 404 GET

- retries once on 500 GET, POST

- retries once on 404, 500, 502 504 file request

- retries once on OPTION, PATCH, HEAD, CONNECT, TRACE

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.ClientResponse<T>
files.Summary:
The response that all Client methods returns

Note that a response statuscode might be 200 OK, but the IsSuccess might be false in scenarios where no response were returned

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.ClientResponse
files.Summary:
Base class of a ClientResponse

- Contains the HttpResponseMessage itself

Used when you do not want to return 'object' nor generic type, but you want to be clear in what object is returned in your C# functions

- Contains 'data' variable for serializing purposes, so 'data' variable is never undefined in JS world (depends on the JSON serialization options youve set, but out of the box its null if not set)

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.ContentType
files.Summary:
An enum of various media types that can be sent to the Client request methods

The 'ContentType' is sent as an 'Accept' HEADER in the request

NOTE: Not all of them have been implemented yet though, but all will be sent as 'ACCEPT' header if specified, if you specify ContentType.none, no accept header is sent

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Extensions.HttpRequestExtensions
files.Summary: HttpRequest extensions

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Extensions.IApplicationBuilderExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for ApplicationBuilder object

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Extensions.IServiceCollectionExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for IServiceCollection

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.HtmlHelperFactory
files.Summary: HtmlHelperFactory builds a new instance of IHtmlBuilder outside of your View Context

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.OutputCachePolicy
files.Summary:
Add any OutputCachePolicy to the OutputCache attribute in the 'PolicyName' property

Requires framework option UseControllers or UseMvc to be true

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.App.Services
files.Summary: Services is a global way to reuse the configured service provider and collection

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Assemblies
files.Summary: Static functions on whitelisted loaded assemblies

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Async
files.Summary: Run methods asynchronously without blocking.

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Attributes.ConfigDecryptAttribute
files.Summary:
Marks a property as the placeholder for a decrypted config value.

The property must be public, instance-level, with both get and set accessors.

Used internally by Config to locate and decrypt values marked with DecryptAttribute on instantiation.

Values must be encrypted using the parameterless Encrypt() method. See StringExtensions.Encrypt() for details.

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Attributes.JsonCompressAttribute
files.Summary:
Compress and decompress a String, Long or Int property or field on serialization and deserialization

Useful when you want to minify long texts before sending to Client or upon receiving

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Attributes.JsonEncryptAttribute
files.Summary:
Encrypt and decrypt a String, Long or Int property or field on serialization and deserialization

Useful when you want to hide productId's or similar in Frontend part of your application. Avoids having int's or ID's in the frontend, for attackers wanting to brute force endpoints taking INTs

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Attributes.JsonObfuscateAttribute
files.Summary:
Obfuscate and deobfuscate a String, Long or Int property or field on serialization and deserialization

Useful when you want to hide productId's or similar in Frontend part of your application when an object is exposed through an API response for instance. Avoids having int's or ID's in the frontend, for attackers wanting to brute force endpoints taking INTs

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Clock
files.Summary: A Clock to measure an actions execution time based on Stopwatch

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Config<T>
files.Summary:
Loads and reads configuration files (.xml, .json, or .config), applies transformations, and decrypts encrypted properties.

Configs can be placed in:

~/*.json, ~/*.xml, ~/Configs/**, ~/Configurations/**, or appended to appsettings.json.

Transformations use the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT variable.

Set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT in:

- launchSettings.json (IIS Express/Kestrel)

- web.config (IIS/IIS Express)

- mstest.runsettings (unit tests)

- command-line --configuration (executables)

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.DateJsonConverter
files.Summary: Use to convert a DateTime into a string date 'yyyy-MM-dd', ignoring time

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.DateTimeJsonConverter
files.Summary: Use to convert a string to DateTime during Json() invocation with your own format

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.DateTimeOffsetJsonConverter
files.Summary: DateTime json converter that takes a string format

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.EnumTextAttribute
files.Summary: Decorate the enum key with text.

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.EnumValueAttribute

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.EnvironmentConfig<T, TEnvironmentNameEnum>
files.Summary: EnvironmentConfig with an option to pass your own Configuration class, along with an enum that defines all environment names.

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.EnvironmentConfig
files.Summary:
Standard class for environmental configurations read from environmentConfig.json if exists

If you've added more properties to environmentConfig.json than just the 'Name' you'd have to inherit 'EnvironmentConfig<YourClass>' and use that instead

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.EnvironmentName
files.Summary:
Enum list of common built-in environment names allowed

Config tranformations and EnvironmentName will work with other env-names, but the IsLocal, IsTest, and IsProd will not

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.ILogWriter
files.Summary:
ILogWriter is responsible for storing log messages

- Create a new class that implements ILogWriter

- Register your class as singleton implementation of the ILogWriter

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Metric
files.Summary: Metric class count metrics in memory and exposing it to Prometheus or the /metrics/ui endpoint if you are on Gold Tier license

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.MetricChartOption
files.Summary:
Create a metric option and pass it into the Metric.Init method to control how the pie chart of a metric is rendered

Note: A pie chart's key is made up of label + category + status, so if you specify the exact same label, category and status, it overrides the existing one

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.MetricCharts
files.Summary: Static class to adjust each pie chart generated on the /metrics/ui endpoint

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.Randomness
files.Summary: Shortcut for generating random values using System.Random

files.Title: SystemLibrary.Common.Framework.SystemType
files.Summary: A static class containing common typeof calls to optimize performance, as typeof can be slow. Use these predefined types whenever possible.
